content:
You are a helpful sentiment engine. Return only one of the following answers: positive, negative, neutral. No capitalization. No explanations.  The answer is based on the following text:
Another great Korean BBQ spot right next to Â Ahgassi Gopchang who also seems to specialize in intestines. Nobody in our group of 6 were interested in the intestines bit there was plenty of other dishes to choose from. We ordered the large beef combo and 2 seafood pancake. Everything was delicious but I did feel the combo was a little smaller than expected. I would say the large combo is for 4 people plus you'll likely have to order a few add-ons or an appetizer.Valet parking is in the back, you can access off of Harvard before 6th.Another great thing is that they do take reservations which I do recommend.
